synopsis:
It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. He also pays a visit to his doctor.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: How To Spend a Long Night

synopsis:
It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. He also visits the sauna.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. He also has a wanted criminal armed with a gun get into his taxi.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes he drives in a little bit of a hurry.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes idols ride in his taxi, but don't worry; he's as tight-lipped as an authentic bartender.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Let Me Hear You Say, "What the Hell?"

synopsis:
It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes he's taken to a cabaret club in Shinjuku.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes weirdos pick fights with him in Shibuya on Halloween.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Come to think of it, he's driven Goriki before.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. However, he's not very good at car chases.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes he's threatened and attacked by passengers.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: If We Could Go Back to That Day

synopsis:
It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Due to his profession, he's familiar with the parking lots around the city.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city. Sometimes he helps rob a bank.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's business as usual for privately-owned taxi driver Odokawa as he drives a variety of passengers around the city.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
